Class Game

java.lang.Object
com.comp3607.Game
public class Game extends Object
Game class - Central game management Demonstrates Single Responsibility and Dependency Inversion Principles

      Parameters:

      value - Question value
      answer - Player's answer
      strategy - Strategy for answer validation
      Returns:
      Result of the turn
